model Module¶

model Module¶

class model.RESTModel(address='localhost', port=8080)¶

Bases: object

A simple REST client

__init__(address='localhost', port=8080)¶
Initiaizes the address and port of the REST server
Parameters:
  • address – the dns/ip address of the server
  • port – the port of the server
get(text='')¶
Send a request to the REST server and get the response
Parameters:text – string being looked at
Returns:json dump of response
set_addr(addr)¶
Set the address of the REST server
Parameters:addr – address of the REST server
set_port(port)¶
Set the port of the REST server
Parameters:port – port of the REST server
